description: {"blocks":[{"key":"482rh","text":"Immunofluorescence protocol of Pax7 on muscle tissues is a critical step for studying skeletal muscle regeneration. Here, I describe the simple protocol for Pax7 for isopentane-frozen muscle tissues with unmasking. Androgen receptor, a member of the nuclear receptor superfamily, can be stained with this protocol to see the double positive cells. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"6klv0","text":"Fix the slides with 4% PFA/PBS for 5 min at room temperature.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"g6rl","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"3nrj8","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":[],"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"8b3i0","text":"Do not air dry the samples before fixing. It may increase the background signal and lose androgen receptoer signal.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"6f4gs","text":"Wash the slides in PBS three times for 5 min.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"72ua0","text":"Place the slides into a slide chamber in PBS","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"adl2r","text":"Fill a beaker with 500 ml of Sodium citrate.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"dlct9","text":"Place the beaker on the hotplate and turn it on full power.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"7a7ik","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":[],"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"1la2g","text":"While wating for the beaker to come to a boil, keep the sections in PBS.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"c5eef","text":"Once boiling, transfer the slides from PBS to the beaker.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"9tqdb","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":[],"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"2qca7","text":"Use care with hot solution. Use forceps.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"20sc4","text":"Remove the beaker from the hotplate and let the beaker cool for 20 min.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"clavk","text":"Wash slides in PBS three times for 5 min.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"88dnf","text":"Block the slides with 5% Goat serum/0.05% Triton X-100/PBS for 1h at room temperature. Prepare 100 µl of 5% Goat serum/0.05% Triton X-100/PBS per slide.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"525os","text":"Drain the slides for a few seconds (do not rinse) and wipe around the sections with tissue paper.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"813u3","text":"Dilute primary antibodies as follows in 5% Goat serum/0.05% Triton X-100/PBS. Prepare 100 µl antibody solution per slide. {"blocks":[{"key":"fs303","text":"Wash the slides in PBS three times for 5 min.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9f25e","text":"Incubate for 1h at room temperature protected from light.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"8j6js","text":"Wash the slides in PBS three times for 5 min.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}
